author: Neal A. Maxwell
text: Faith in God includes faith in His timing.

author: Jeffrey R. Holland
text: Hope is never lost when we trust in the Lord.

author: Russell M. Nelson
text: The joy we feel has little to do with the circumstances of our lives and everything to do with the focus of our lives.

author: Henry B. Eyring
text: When we choose to follow Christ, we choose to be changed.

author: Elaine S. Dalton
text: You were born to lead in righteousness.

author: David A. Bednar
text: The tender mercies of the Lord are real and do not occur randomly or merely by coincidence.

author: Linda K. Burton
text: We are here to love, lift, and help each other.

author: Gordon B. Hinckley
text: Be believing, be happy, do not get discouraged. Things will work out.

author: Sheri Dew
text: If life were easy, it would not be hard.

author: Boyd K. Packer
text: The study of the doctrines of the gospel will improve behavior quicker than a study of behavior will improve behavior.

author: Julie B. Beck
text: Strong families are not an accident. They are built through faith, prayer, and effort.

author: M. Russell Ballard
text: The Lord does not expect perfection, but He does expect effort.

author: President Nelson
text: Let God prevail in your life.
